function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Relying solely on online information from verified sources may lead to incomplete or biased understanding of the pandemic","Impact":"Misinformation and biased understanding may lead to ineffective or harmful mitigation strategies","Mitigation":"Include diverse perspectives from medical, technical, and social science professionals to ensure a comprehensive understanding","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Research authors, society at large","Owner":"Research authors, academic institutions, scientific organizations"},{"Description":"Elimination of works that may contain relevant information may result in oversight of key insights or developments in pandemic control","Impact":"Missed opportunities to incorporate important findings or technologies into the manuscript","Mitigation":"Regularly update the literature search criteria to capture recent advancements and insights","Technologies":"Literature search algorithms, advanced text analysis tools","People":"Research authors, scientific community","Owner":"Research authors, academic institutions"},{"Description":"Potential bias in the selection and scrutiny of works may result in a skewed representation of the available information","Impact":"Inaccurate or incomplete representation of the potential technologies and their effectiveness in controlling the pandemic","Mitigation":"Implement a peer review process to ensure impartiality and diversity in the selection of works","Technologies":"Peer review platforms, collaborative editing tools","People":"Research authors, peer reviewers","Owner":"Research authors, scientific community"}]}
